item.title: Outside number 3 Plympton Avenue, 24th October

item.category: Obstruction - Overgrown / overhanging private tree / hedge

item.title: Diesel Vehicle Idling for over 3 hours outside residential property, 24th October
item.description:
Cranwood Street EC1V - This vehicle HN72 YFS has been idling since 8:30 this morning - 24th October 2025, the time is now 11:20 - the flats stink of diesel fumes

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranwood Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please remove litter from this verge, 24th October

item.title: Spillage on Road - White paint, plaster?, 24th October
item.description:
There has been a big spillage of paint, plaster or some other material on East Dulwich Road (near the junction of Oakhurst Grove). This has appeared in the last day or so. Please can this be cleaned urgently. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, East Dulwich Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: All street drains blocked, 24th October
item.description:
Thames water when diggiing up the street left gravel, soil and other matter which has been washed into the drain and they are visibly blocked with streams of water flowing down the street from heavy rain and the 2 leaks that Thames water are not rushing to fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gordon Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes at 60 Gloucester Gardens, 24th October
item.description:
Numerous large potholes outside Gloucester Gardens. For many months there has been scaffolding outside of the buildings for continued external work, with many big lorries coming and going from that area. As a result, there are now numerous big potholes that have formed. They are hazardous to the cars parked outside and need filling in. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Bridge Road, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
